    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    Main application class that starts the server.
    Board
    An abstract class representing a game board.
    Bot
    class representing Bot player
    BotStrategy
     
    ClassicBoard
    Represents a classic board for the game.
    ClassicGameMode
    ClassicGameMode class implements the GameMode interface for a classic game mode.
    Command
     
    CommandHandler
    klasa do mapowania polece≈Ñ
    CreateGameCommand
    A command that creates a new game with a specified name, number of players, nickname, and game mode.
    Field
    Represents a single field on the game board.
    Game
    Represents a game session, managing players, the board, and game state.
    GameMode
    Interface defining the structure and behavior of a game mode.
    GameModeHandler
    Handles the management and retrieval of different game modes.
    GameState
    Represents the state of the game.
    JoinGameCommand
    A command that allows a player to join an existing game by name and set their nickname.
    MoveCommand
    A command that handles a player's move in the game.
    NormalBotStrategy
     
    PassCommand
    A command that allows a player to pass their turn in the game.
    Player
    Represents a player in the game.
    Server
    Represents the server, implemented as a singleton pattern.
    SetNickCommand
     
    StartGameCommand
     
    YingYangMode
    A special variation of the classic game mode that supports only two players.
